channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- watchOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- watchOS

item.title: CVE-2017-13905|2024-08-05T19:13:41.368Z -- apple -- watchos
item.description: A race condition was addressed with additional validation. This issue is fixed in tvOS 11.2, iOS 11.2, macOS High Sierra 10.13.2, Security Update 2017-002 Sierra, and Security Update 2017-005 El Capitan, watchOS 4.2. An application may be able to gain elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2017-13880|2024-08-05T19:13:41.215Z -- apple -- watchos
item.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixed in iOS 11.2, watchOS 4.2. An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privilege.

item.title: CVE-2024-27814|2024-08-02T00:41:55.425Z -- apple -- watchos
item.description: This issue was addressed through improved state management. This issue is fixed in watchOS 10.5. A person with physical access to a device may be able to view contact information from the lock screen.

item.title: CVE-2024-27814|2024-06-11T19:06:32.639Z -- apple -- watchos
item.description: This issue was addressed through improved state management. This issue is fixed in watchOS 10.5. A person with physical access to a device may be able to view contact information from the lock screen.
